    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swimming Poppet](/Feats.aspx?ID=3350) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Poppet" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=418" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 65</row>

</column>

---

Your fins, flippers, or other accessories assist with steering you through water. You gain a swim Speed of 15 feet.
name: Swimming Poppet
